subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
subSections.text:
{{der-top|Compounds}}
* {{ja-r|狩%猟|しゅ%りょう}}: [[hunting]]
* {{ja-r|狩%猟%期|しゅ%りょう%き}}: [[hunting season]]
* {{ja-r|狩%猟%場|しゅ%りょう%ば}}: a [[hunting preserve]]
* {{ja-r|狩%人|かり%うど}}, {{ja-r|狩人|かりゅうど}}: a [[hunter]]
* {{ja-r|狩%漁|しゅ%ぎょ}}: [[hunting]] and [[fishing]]
{{der-mid}}
* {{ja-r|狩%犬|かり%いぬ}}: a [[hunting]] dog; a [[hound]]
* {{ja-r|狩%猟%犬|しゅ%りょう%けん}}: a hunting dog; a hound
* {{ja-r|狩り小%屋|かりこ%や}}: a [[hunting lodge]]
* {{ja-r|狩%猟 小%屋|しゅ%りょう こ%や}}: a [[hunting lodge]]
{{der-bottom}}

subSections.title: Noun
